title: Flying squid statue bought with COVID-19 relief money puts Japanese town in spotlight
content:
1. Flying squid statue bought with COVID-19 relief money puts Japanese town in spotlight  USA TODAY
  2. Japanese Town Spends Covid Money on a Giant Squid Statue  The New York Times
  3. Covid grant pays for $250000 giant squid statue in Japan | AFP  AFP News Agency
  4. This Japanese town was given over $7 million for COVID-19 relief. They used $230,000 to build a giant squid statue.  CBS News
  5. Japanese town spent Covid-19 relief funds on building a statue of a giant squid  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
